subject: Project Falcon Delay
body:
Hi Bob,
We are experiencing delays in Project Falcon due to supplier issues. Expect 2-week delay.
Regards,
Alice

subject: Project Falcon Delay
body:
Thanks for the update. Can you send revised timeline?
Thanks,
Bob

subject: Project Falcon Delay
body:
Sure. Revised delivery expected by July 14th.
-Alice

subject: Q3 Marketing Budget
body:
Finance approved 10% increase in marketing for Q3.
Please adjust campaigns accordingly.
Carol

subject: Q3 Marketing Budget
body:
Thanks Carol. Please proceed accordingly.
-Dave

subject: Office Move Update
body:
We’re moving to the 5th floor starting next Monday. Packing materials will be provided.
-John

subject: Office Move Update
body:
Will the network be available during the move?
-Sara

subject: Office Move Update
body:
Yes, minimal downtime expected.
-John

subject: New Intern Joining
body:
Kavita Sharma will join as intern in product team starting 5th Aug.
Recruiter

subject: New Intern Joining
body:
Noted. Welcome email and onboarding to be scheduled.
-HR

subject: Client Feedback - Zenith Corp
body:
Zenith reported confusion around analytics dashboard. Suggested improvements:
- Add tooltips
- Better export options

subject: Client Feedback - Zenith Corp
body:
Thanks! Adding these to the next sprint planning.
-Product Team

subject: Security Training Reminder
body:
Reminder: Security awareness training is mandatory. Complete by Aug 10th.
-IT Team

subject: Security Training Reminder
body:
Got it, will complete by deadline.
-Sam

subject: Leave Approval - Tanya
body:
Tanya's leave from July 18 to 22 is approved.
-Manager

subject: Leave Approval - Tanya
body:
Thanks. We'll update the system.
-HR

subject: Procurement Request Approval
body:
Requesting approval for purchasing new laptops for dev team.
Cost: ₹3,00,000.
-Admin

subject: Procurement Request Approval
body:
Approved. Proceed with procurement.
-Finance

subject: Remote Work Extension Request
body:
Requesting remote work extension till July 31 due to personal reasons.
-Tina

subject: Remote Work Extension Request
body:
Extension granted. Keep in touch with team lead daily.
-Manager

subject: Expense Report Clarification
body:
Please clarify why July travel expenses were partially reimbursed.
-Employee

subject: Expense Report Clarification
body:
Some receipts were missing. Please upload them to get full reimbursement.
-Accounts
